title: Famoso Neapolitan Pizzeria - North York
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, Italian, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Franchise Neopolitan pizzeria. No specific vegan pizza on menu but you could substitute Daiya mozzarella vegan cheese on your pizza at no extra charge. Also offers vegan sorbet which you can get in a cone.
streetAddress: 3401 Dufferin Street, Yorkdale Mall Unit R04
